synopsis.p: Combines together snd files from each slice of a Borealis-style radar.

description.p: Combines together multiple snd files from each slice of a Borealis-style radar to produce a single file written to standard output.

example.description: Combines together all files called "20201020.20.sas.?.snd" to produce a file called "19981020.20.sas.snd". The status is logged to standard error.
